page.body:
My Data is displayed on two tabs: Personal Information and Corporate Information.
The Personal Information tab displays your own personal information, including emergency contacts , bank details , address details , family members and ethnicity .
The Corporate Information tab displays information about the organisation in which you work, including organisational data and history, contract details and employment dates.
To create new personal or corporate information, click the New link. To make changes to the information, click the Edit link next to the information that you want to change.
